0100101000100100 1110101100010111 1 -> sum: 0011010100111100, cout: 1

0100100110011000 0110100100101111 0 -> sum: 1011001011000111, cout: 0
1000000000010111 1010110110100010 0 -> sum: 0010110110111001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
